brief_summary.textblock:
Aim 1 is to study prevalence and 1 year incidence of metabolic syndrome in major depressive
      disorder and factors correlation.

      Aim 2 is to study prevalence and 1 year incidence of thyroid dysfunction in major depressive
      disorder and factors correlation.

clinical_study.brief_title: Incidence of Metabolic Syndrome and Thyroid Dysfunction in Patients With Major Depressive Disorder

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  patient with major depressive disorder

          -  age over 18 years

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  subject who cannot give information.

clinical_study.official_title: Incidence and Prevalence of and Factors Associated With Metabolic Syndrome and Thyroid Dysfunction in Patients With Major Depressive Disorder

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Case-Only, Time Perspective: Prospective
